rules.name: armor

rules.name: planted roots
rules.text: This model cannot be moved by enemy effects and ignores the Severe Terrain Trait. At the start of this model's Activation, if it is in Severe Terrain, this model Heals 1.

rules.name: hard to kill
rules.text: When this model suffers damage, if it has 2 or more Health, it may not be reduced to below 1 Health.

rules.name: the land's hunger
rules.text: After this model places one or more Blast Markers, after resolving the current Action, choose a Blast Marker that is not touching any Hungry Land Markers. The chosen Blast Marker is not discarded and instead becomes a 50mm Severe, Hazardous, Hungry Land Marker. This model is unaffected by Hungry Land Markers.
